class.name: ModLoader
class.description: The [ModLoader] singleton is used to manage mods for the game.

method.name: load_content
method.description: Loads all the mods in the load order.

method.name: has_mod
method.description: Returns true if the mod exists, but not if it has loaded.

method.name: is_mod_loaded
method.description: Returns true if the mod is loaded.

method.name: get_mod_init
method.description: Returns the ModInit of a given ID.
